{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = TL-WN781N 1.0 1.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = 150Mbps WIreless Lite N PCI Express Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=243&model=TL-WN781ND |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = TP-LINK_TL-WN781ND_v1 |wikipedia = |brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WN781ND |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002b |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 30a1 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TE7WN781N |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 90:F6:52 |chip1 = Atheros;AR9285; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/17/2010 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''TP-LINK''' TL-WN781N is the same adapter.. but with an integral antenna. "2053500245" and "Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the internal photos.
"MODEL:11n PCI-E Adapter-6(AR11) A" and "REV:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the image provided by '''TP-LINK'''. Possible 00:23:CD OUI (it's on a label in the FCC photos) ==Links of Interest== [http://forums.opensuse.org/english/get-technical-help-here/wireless/475690-problem-tpllink-wn781nd-wireless-card.html lspci -v] :168c:002b (168c:30a1) PCI ID [http://www.insanelymac.com/forum/topic/234570-atheros-ar9285-fix-for-snow-leopard/page__st__100 same PCI ID mentioned again] (w/ 90:F6:52 OUI) ==Pictures==
